info.title: Travel Stories API
info.description: REST API documentation for the travel platform

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Authentication and authorization operations (login, logout, reset password, Google OAuth)

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Operations related to traveller profiles and saved stories

tags.name: Stories
tags.description: Operations related to managing travel stories (CRUD, images, categories)

post.description: Authenticate a user and return access and refresh tokens
Log out user and invalidate access token
Refresh access token using refresh token and session ID from cookies. This is a public endpoint.
Send password reset email to the user
Reset the user's password using a token from email

get.description: Get the Google OAuth 2.0 authorization URL to start authentication. This is a public endpoint.

post.description: Complete Google OAuth authentication by providing the authorization code received from Google

code.description: Authorization code received from Google OAuth redirect

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users. This is a public endpoint.
Get user profile by ID including their articles. This is a public endpoint.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve (MongoDB ObjectId)

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information including saved stories

message.example: Successfully found the user with id: 672b6cfea9f43a5e8f9f21a2

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information. Can update name, description, and optionally upload a new avatar.

schema.description: At least one field must be provided

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's avatar image. Requires authentication.

post.description: Add a story to the authenticated user's saved stories list

parameters.name: storyId
parameters.description: The ID of the story to save (MongoDB ObjectId)

delete.description: Remove a story from the authenticated user's saved stories list

parameters.name: storyId
parameters.description: The ID of the story to remove from saved (MongoDB ObjectId)

200.description: Story removed from saved or was not in saved

get.description: Get list of stories with pagination and category filtering. This is a public endpoint that does not require authentication.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Optional. Filter stories by category ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

post.description: Create a new travel story. Requires authentication. Image is optional but title, article, and category are required.

article.example: Це був незабутній день у Римі...

img.description: Optional image file for the story

patch.description: Update an existing story by its ID. Allows updating title, article, category fields and uploading a new image. Requires authentication and ownership of the story.

parameters.name: storyId
parameters.description: The ID of the story to update (MongoDB ObjectId)

article.example: A detailed updated story about my trip to Kyiv...

category.description: Optional. Category ID (MongoDB ObjectId, 24 character hex string)

schema.description: At least one field (title, article, category) or file (img) must be provided

description.example: The best traveler in the World

article.example: A detailed story about my trip to Iceland...

200.description: Successful response with paginated stories list

400.description: Bad Request - validation or incorrect request parameters

404.description: Story not found or user is not the owner

message.example: The story cannot be found, or you are not its author.
Reset password email was successfully sent!

description.example: Привіт! Я Дмитро. Люблю знаходити приховані перлини у кожній поїздці та ділитися ними. Світ повний дивовижних відкриттів!

hasPreviousPage.description: Whether there is a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Whether there is a next page

401-noAccess.description: Unauthorized. Access token is missing, invalid, or expired
